thread.title: Svetlana Alexievich of Belarus wins Nobel literature prize
thread.title_full: Svetlana Alexievich of Belarus wins Nobel literature prize

title: Svetlana Alexievich of Belarus wins Nobel literature prize
text:
> Entertainment Svetlana Alexievich of Belarus wins Nobel literature prize Belarusian journalist and writer Svetlana Alexievich the 2015 Nobel literature winner, holds flowers as she leaves after a news conference in Minsk, Belarus, Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015. Belarusian writer Svetlana Alexievich won the Nobel Prize in literature Thursday, for works that the prize judges called "a monument to suffering and courage." (AP Photo/Sergei Grits) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
